Title: Relates to coverage for health care services under the basic health program for individuals whose immigration status renders him or her ineligible for federal financial participation
Summary: Provides eligibility for services under the basic health program for individuals whose immigration status renders him or her ineligible for federal financial participation and who meet additional requirements.
LawCode: Amd §369-gg, Art 5 Title 11-D Head, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to coverage for health care services under the basic health program for individuals whose immigration status renders him or her ineligible for federal financial participation
